title: First answer choice
text: Incorrect: Showing equal or matching records is accomplished when you set the join and do not change the default join type, which is considered an inner join.

title: Second answer choice
text: Incorrect: When you link tables together and you use the wrong field to join them, it will produce an invalid result, and oftentimes no results at all will show when you run your query

title: Fourth answer choice
text: Incorrect: To show all records from a table means a join line was established and set with a join type of Left Outer.
